content: The current thinking about sessions is that most of them will be discussion topics without formal presentations. However, we will entertain accept and schedule more structured presentations as needed or suggested. We are trying to avoid 1) a complicated session submission process 2) the need to recruit lots of formal structured presentations. BUT, I think that if you have a presentation/talk idea, we should be able to work that into the schedule.
I like the idea of discussions + live demos if something comes up and words are not enough to explain.

I like the idea of discussions + live demos if something comes up and words are not enough to explain.

The current plan/thinking is to focus on discussions/conversations - but to accept and schedule demos or presentations as requested or as they make sense.
